title: nAgAnandini rAgam
sahitya:
nAgAnandini rAgam pADiyE nAda pUjai sheidEn Adi shivanE


anupallavi

  dEhAlayattin divya sannidhi vaLar dhyAna vaDivAna cinmaya mUrtiyE


caraNam    anjum aDangit-tannarivAga ninrE antarAtma sukham vandu vandinikkavE
nenjinilE muraLi konja vINaiyuDan niradhishayAnadap-para nAdap-paN muzhanga
